001package edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.service;
002
003
004import android.annotation.SuppressLint;
005import android.util.Log;
006import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.model.Game;
007import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.model.Guess;
008import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.model.entity.GameResult;
009import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.model.entity.User;
010import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Scheduler;
011import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
012import io.reactivex.rxjava3.schedulers.Schedulers;
013import java.time.Duration;
014import java.util.Date;
015import java.util.List;
016import javax.inject.Inject;
017
018public class CodebreakerRepository {
019
020  private static final String TAG = CodebreakerRepository.class.getSimpleName();
021  private final CodebreakerServiceProxy proxy;
022  private final GameResultRepository resultRepository;
023  private final UserRepository userRepository;
024  private final GoogleSignInService signInService;
025  private final Scheduler scheduler;
026  private Game game;
027
028  @Inject
029  CodebreakerRepository(CodebreakerServiceProxy proxy, GameResultRepository resultRepository,
030      UserRepository userRepository, GoogleSignInService signInService) {
031    this.proxy = proxy;
032    this.resultRepository = resultRepository;
033    this.userRepository = userRepository;
034    this.signInService = signInService;
035    scheduler = Schedulers.single();
036  }
037
038  public Single<Game> startGame(Game game) {
039    return signInService
040        .refreshBearerToken()
041        .observeOn(scheduler)
042        .flatMap((token) -> proxy.startGame(game, token))
043        .doOnSuccess(this::setGame);
044  }
045
046  @SuppressLint("CheckResult")
047  public Single<Guess> submitGuess(String text) {
048    return signInService
049        .refreshBearerToken()
050        .observeOn(scheduler)
051        .flatMap((token) -> proxy.submitGuess(game.getId(), game.validate(text), token))
052        .flatMap((guess) -> {
053          game.getGuesses().add(guess);
054          return game.isSolved()
055              ? userRepository
056              .getCurrentUser()
057              .map((user) -> toResult(game, user))
058              .flatMap(resultRepository::add)
059              .map((result) -> guess)
060              : Single.just(guess);
061        })
062        .subscribeOn(scheduler);
063  }
064
065  public Single<Game> getGame(String id) {
066    return signInService
067        .refreshBearerToken()
068        .observeOn(scheduler)
069        .flatMap((token)-> proxy.getGame(id, token))
070        .doOnSuccess(this::setGame);
071  }
072
073  public Game getGame() {
074    return game;
075  }
076
077  private void setGame(Game game) {
078    this.game = game;
079  }
080
081  private GameResult toResult(Game game, User user) {
082    GameResult result = new GameResult();
083    result.setUserId(user.getId());
084    result.setCodeLength(game.getLength());
085    List<Guess> guesses = game.getGuesses();
086    int size = guesses.size();
087    result.setGuessCount(size);
088    Date lastTimestamp = guesses.get(size - 1).getTimestamp();
089    result.setTimestamp(lastTimestamp.toInstant());
090    result.setDuration(
091        Duration.ofMillis(lastTimestamp.getTime() -
092            guesses.get(0).getTimestamp().getTime()
093        ));
094    return result;
095  }
096}
